extension.description: Video Block Module is a Joomla! 2.5 Module which displays modules as a tab from joomla module manager.

field.name: vidselector
field.label: Video Selector
field.description: Selector can be tag (body, footer etc), Unique class or ID (#page, #block)

field.name: videopath
field.label: Video path
field.description: Specify path to the video files (add slash to the end)

field.name: filesname
field.label: Video files name
field.description: All media files should have equal names. You need to prepare three videos(mp4,ogv,webm) and three images (gif,jpg,png)
